tool_description: Get evergreen blogs for your mobile apps.
name: BlogsAPI
title: BlogsAPI

api_list.name: Latest Posts
api_list.description: Get all blogs ordered by latest first.

api_list.name: Blogs by category
api_list.description: Get all blogs from a particular category by its ID.

api_list.name: Search Tags
api_list.description: Get all blogs if the term is one of the tags.

api_list.name: Single Category
api_list.description: Get single category details with its thumbnail and description.

api_list.name: Categories
api_list.description: List all available categories from the BlogsAPI.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://blogsapi.p.rapidapi.com/categories/"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "blogsapi.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
